casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael McIVER. No. 377P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. William W. Polk, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of May 2007 by Defendant for Request for Extraordinary Relief and for Leave to File a Request for Reconsideration:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
